Type.name: Assert
Type.Description: An assertion class for testing epl applications
Type.Summary: An assertion class for testing epl applications

Action.name: assertLesserThan
Action.Description: Asserts that testVal is lesser than refVal.
Action.Summary: Asserts that testVal is lesser than refVal.

Action.name: assertInRange
Action.Description: Asserts that a value lies within a range. Supports integers and floats as test val.
Action.Summary: Asserts that a value lies within a range. Supports integers and floats as test val.

Parameter.name: lowerBound
Parameter.Description: lower bound for the range. must be of the same type as testVal.

Parameter.name: higherBound
Parameter.Description: higher bound for the range. must be of the same type as testVal.

Action.name: createCustom
Action.Description: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from, with custom arguments.
Action.Summary: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from, with custom arguments.

Parameter.name: options
Parameter.Description: dictionary<string, any>, options include: <boolean>isEnabled - set to true to enable logging <string>logLevel - either "ERROR" or "DEBUG" sets logging level.

Action.name: assertFalse
Action.Description: Asserts that a value is false.
Action.Summary: Asserts that a value is false.

Action.name: assertEquals
Action.Description:
Asserts that two values are equal. Uses different handling depending on type:
Integer, string, boolean - uses the '=' operator.
float - checks equality within a tolerance of 0.0001.
others - uses the any .getFields() method as a comparator.
Action.Summary: Asserts that two values are equal. Uses different handling depending on type:

Action.name: assertGreaterThan
Action.Description: Asserts that testVal is greater than refVal.
Action.Summary: Asserts that testVal is greater than refVal.

Action.name: assertContains
Action.Description: Asserts that an event contains a specific field
Action.Summary: Asserts that an event contains a specific field

Parameter.name: fieldName
Parameter.Description: name of the field being inspected.

Action.name: assertBase
Action.Description: Logs an assertion failure when test does not pass.
Action.Summary: Logs an assertion failure when test does not pass.

Parameter.name: pass
Parameter.Description: set to true if a test passes, false if it fails.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.Description: custom message with information about test failure.

Action.name: assertNoThrow
Action.Description: Asserts that an action does not throw an exception
Action.Summary: Asserts that an action does not throw an exception

Action.name: assertTrue
Action.Description: Asserts that a value is true.
Action.Summary: Asserts that a value is true.

Action.name: create
Action.Description: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from. this will set private variables logLevel to "ERROR" and isEnabled to true
Action.Summary: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from. this will set private variables logLevel to "ERROR" and isEnabled to true

Action.name: assertThrowsException
Action.Description: Asserts that an action throws a specific exception type
Action.Summary: Asserts that an action throws a specific exception type

Parameter.name: exceptionType
Parameter.Description: type of exception expected to be thrown

Action.name: assertThrows
Action.Description: Asserts that an action throws an exception
Action.Summary: Asserts that an action throws an exception

Action.name: assertNotEquals
Action.Description:
Asserts that two values are not equal. Uses different handling depending on type:
Integer, string, boolean - uses the '=' operator.
float - checks inequality within a tolerance of 0.0001.
others - uses the any .getFields() method as a comparator.
Action.Summary: Asserts that two values are not equal. Uses different handling depending on type:

Type.name: iotTestHelper
Type.Description: A set of utility actions for testing EPL applications
Type.Summary: A set of utility actions for testing EPL applications

Action.name: sendMeasurement
Action.Description: Sends a measurement with a given value to Cumulocity IoT.
Action.Summary: Sends a measurement with a given value to Cumulocity IoT.

Returns.Description: The reqId of the measurement event.

Parameter.name: source
Parameter.Description: The id of the ManagedObject that is the source of the measurement.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.Description: The value of the measurement to be sent.

Action.name: createDevice
Action.Description: Creates a device simulator.
Action.Summary: Creates a device simulator.

Returns.Description: The reqId of the ManagedObject event sent to create a device.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.Description: The name of our device simulator.

Type.name: Assert
Type.Description: An assertion class for testing epl applications
Type.Summary: An assertion class for testing epl applications

Action.name: createCustom
Action.Description: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from.
Action.Summary: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from.

Parameter.name: options
Parameter.Description: dictionary<string, any>, options include: <boolean>isEnabled - set to true to enable logging <string>logLevel - either "ERROR" or "DEBUG" sets logging level.

Action.name: create
Action.Description: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from. this will set private variables logLevel to "ERROR" and isEnabled to true
Action.Summary: Creates an instance of the Assert event to run assertions from. this will set private variables logLevel to "ERROR" and isEnabled to true

Action.name: assertEquals
Action.Description:
Asserts that two values are equal. Uses different handling depending on type:
Integer, string, boolean - uses the '=' operator.
float - checks equality within a tolerance of 0.0001.
others - uses the any .getFields() method as a comparator.
Action.Summary: Asserts that two values are equal. Uses different handling depending on type:

Action.name: assertBase
Action.Description: Logs an assertion failure when test does not pass.
Action.Summary: Logs an assertion failure when test does not pass.

Parameter.name: pass
Parameter.Description: set to true if a test passes, false if it fails.

Parameter.name: message
Parameter.Description: custom message with information about test failure.

Action.name: createNewDevice
Action.Description: Creates a device simulator to be the source of the measurement.
Action.Summary: Creates a device simulator to be the source of the measurement.

Returns.Description: The reqId of the ManagedObject event sent to create a device.

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.Description: The name of our device simulator.

Action.name: sendMeasurement
Action.Description: Sends a measurement with a given value to Cumulocity IoT.
Action.Summary: Sends a measurement with a given value to Cumulocity IoT.

Returns.Description: The reqId of the measurement event.

Parameter.name: source
Parameter.Description: The id of the ManagedObject that is the source of the measurement.

Parameter.name: value
Parameter.Description: The value of the measurement to be sent.

Type.name: AlarmOnMeasurementThreshold
Type.Description: Raise Alarm if Measurement exceeds a threshold value
Type.Summary: Raise Alarm if Measurement exceeds a threshold value
